attributes.action: General Election to remind MP's to act for their voters. Not for self interests
attributes.additional_details: The People of the UK voted to leave the EU, so why are MP's doing as much as they can to stop what the people of Great Britain want. If trade is the main issue we have access to the commonwealth our traders of the past, and new routes to the rest of the world. This is all without the restrictions that the unelected EU has on us.
attributes.background: To often MP's that have been put in place by the voting public are forgetting that they should act on the directions of their constituency. They are the voice of the voting public, they have not been elected for self gain.
